directions: Stir tomatoes, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and basil together in a large salad bowl; gently fold in mozzarella cheese ; season with salt and black pepper. Chill before serving.
ingredients: 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, or more to taste
6 leaves fresh basil, cut into slivers
1/2 pound mozzarella cheese, cut into bite-size cubes
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Smiling Caprese Salad
